DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial evaluate effect single dose denufosol versus placebo mucociliary clearance patient mild moderate CF lung disease
DOC.brief_title: Study Denufosol Inhalation Solution Patients With Mild Moderate Cystic Fibrosis Lung Disease
DOC.criteria: confirm diagnosis cystic fibrosis FEV1 great equal 60 % predict normal age , gender , height able reproducibly perform spirometry maneuver clinically stable least 4 week prior screen abnormal renal liver function chest xray screen abnormality suggest clinically significant active pulmonary disease lung transplant
